InPlaceVariantAttributeNode Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»InPlaceBorderNode. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Attribute CountNumber of variant attribute terminals. Also the number of name terminals. There will always at least be one. When written, this property will add or delete name and attribute pairs to both paired nodes. Details
Attribute Terminal HeightHeight in pixels of variant name and attribute terminals. Details
Attribute TerminalsArray of attribute input or output terminals. Details
Found TerminalsArray of Boolean found? terminals. Details
Header HeightHeight in pixels of the Variant input/output terminal. This is the fixed-size top section of the node. Details
Name TerminalsArray of name input or output terminals. Details
Variant InputThe Variant input or output terminal. Details
